front.title: HIP-based Failure Detection and Recovery for Multihoming

abstract.t: This document defines a mechanism of failure detection as well as communication recovery for the scenarios of multi-homing of Host Identity Protocol (HIP). It can be applied to HIP by using newly defined HIP parameters, so that a HIP-enabled multihomed host can timely detect the failures and switch to an alternative locator if currently used link breaks down or currently used locator is deprecated.
